channel.title: Boring Science on Slow Agility
channel.description: Recent content in Boring Science on Slow Agility

item.title: Mike, where is your head!?
item.description: It was on september 10, 1945, when Mike lost his head. But this was not the end of his life. Mike was just five-and-a-half-months old, when farmer Lloyd Olsen planned to eat him for dinner. Olsen beheaded Mike to kill him - but that was not Mikes plan this day!

item.title: Probably the most boring experiment in the world
item.description: The Pitch drop experiment Warning! Maybe you fall asleep while reading this. Make sure you sit or lay down before you start reading.
